channel.title: Lost Dynasty - 474 Look-Alike - Economy Based
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to the official development thread of my newest project!
[center][u][i][b][size=18pt]Lost Dynasty[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center]
Lost Dynasty will be a server based on dedication and competition, the server will contain many mini-games and small quests to do in-between you're experience of the server. The main focus of the server will be to have one of the best economy-based servers around. What you will realize is that all throughout the development I will show-case multiple things that will prove the server's toughness and uniqueness. Please enjoy.
Goals: Create an environment both new players and old players will enjoy constantly. Continue to upgrade the server with new features and mini-games to keep everyone preoccupied. Be known as one of the best (if not the best :p) economy based servers around. Release the server for people to use as a base for feature server. There are many other goals however I do not feel like typing them all out as they are personal goals I wish to achieve creating this server.
Current Status: Alpha. Current Task: Laying down the foundation for the mini-games/cities that people will explore.
Media:
[b]Bolt Enchanting:[/b]
[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/1646/boltse.jpg[/img]
[b]Not anything new but Skill Cape Emotes:[/b]
[img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/9906/capesy.jpg[/img]
[b]Clue Scrolls and Rewards: [/b]
[img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/9155/cluescroll1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/1286/cluescroll2j.jpg[/img]
[b]Updated Equipment Interface:[/b]
[img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/1760/equipi.jpg[/img]
[b]HeadIcons with Correct Skull/Headicon Combo:[/b]
[img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/493/headicons.jpg[/img]
[b]Herblore, with Cleaning and Correct Levels:[/b]
[img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/5417/herbsy.jpg[/img]
[b]Mage with Correct GFX's: [/b]
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/7968/mageb.jpg[/img]
[b]Teleport Tablets with Correct Animations and GFX's:[/b]
[img]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/7118/tabs.jpg[/img]
[b]Godsword Creating: [/b]
[img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/796/shards.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/1153/bladex.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/1712/swordf.jpg[/img]
All Spam and Flame comments will be reported to moderators!
